sect1.title: Introduction
sect1.para:
This is a test of footnotes
Those short explanations on the bottom of the page extraction, since footnotes are not "final" (i.e. directly extracted) elements.

That means that if there is some ignorable content inside the footnote
Remember?
, they would still not be shown in the output. This also applies to other cases of nested tags, but it was originally reported against footnotes as bug #172784.
